results.question: Which band had hits in 1972 with the songs "Baby I'm A Want You", "Everything I Own" and "The Guitar Man"

incorrect_answers: Why Don't We Do It in the Road?

results.question: In the Panic! At the Disco's song "Nothern Downpour", which lyric follows 'I know the world's a broken bone'.

incorrect_answers: "So sing your song until you're home"
"So let them know they're on their own"
"So start a fire in their cold stone"
